rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, you may choose a party from among creatures you control. Untap those creatures. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
Flow – {6}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for {1}.)[/i]
